verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> did <S%H5254>tempt<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> here I am.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> son <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H157>love,<s%> and <S%H3212>get<s%> you <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4179>Moriah;<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> him <S%H8033>there<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering on <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H559>tell<s%> you of.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5288>young<s%> men with him, and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him.
Then on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7350>afar<s%> off.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>young<s%> men, <S%H3427>Abide<s%> you <S%H6311>here<s%> with the <S%H2543>ass;<s%> and I and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H5704>yonder<s%> <S%H3541><s%> and <S%H7812>worship,<s%> and <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to you.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and a <S%H3979>knife;<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1>father:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I, my <S%H1121>son.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> and the <S%H6086>wood:<s%> but <S%H346>where<s%> is the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering?

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H7200>provide<s%> himself a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering: so they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him of; and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and laid the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order,<s%> and <S%H6123>bound<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7971>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3979>knife<s%> to <S%H7819>slay<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>Lay<s%> not your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H3972>any<s%> thing to him: for <S%H6258>now<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> seeing you have not <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3162>only<s%> son from me.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> him a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H270>caught<s%> in a <S%H5442>thicket<s%> by his <S%H7161>horns:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> him up for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering in the <S%H8478>stead<s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3070>Jehovahjireh:<s%> as it is <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> In the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> it shall be <S%H7200>seen.<s%>
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%>

And <S%H559>said,<s%> By myself have I <S%H7650>sworn,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> for <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and have not <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> son:

That in <S%H1288>blessing<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and in <S%H7235>multiplying<s%> I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H8193>shore;<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies;<s%>

And in your <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed;<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H5288>young<s%> men, and they <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> she has also <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor;<s%>
<S%H5780>Huz<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H938>Buz<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%>
And <S%H3777>Chesed,<s%> and <S%H2375>Hazo,<s%> and <S%H6394>Pildash,<s%> and <S%H3044>Jidlaph,<s%> and <S%H1328>Bethuel.<s%>

And <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> did <S%H3205>bear<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And his <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7208>Reumah,<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> also <S%H2875>Tebah,<s%> and <S%H1514>Gaham,<s%> and <S%H8477>Thahash,<s%> and <S%H4601>Maachah.<s%>
